title: Croix de Fer
text: The Croix de fer (2,343 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Mont%20Blanc%20Massif">Mont Blanc Massif</a>, overlooking <a href="Trient%2C%20Switzerland">Trient</a> in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. It is located north of the <a href="T%C3%AAte%20de%20Balme">Tête de Balme</a> and L'Arolette and it is the culminating point of the group between the <a href="Col%20des%20Montets">Col des Montets</a> and the <a href="Col%20de%20Balme">Col de Balme</a>.
